summary: Two sisters travelling to Japan to do interviews about global warming are caught in the midst of a horrendous earthquake, until they discover that it's something quite different.
cast: Erin Evans|Sarah Lieving|Justin L. Jones|Kazuyuki Okada|Yoshi Ando|Jennifer Kim|Hiroshi Ueha|Akira Sato|Kosei Seki|Jason Williams|Robert Chu|Shin Shimizu|Chad Nell|Yosuke Hosoi|Brian Takahashi
title: Monster
